verses.text: \w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* gather yourself \w in|strong="H3478"\w* troops, daughter \w of|strong="H3117"\w* troops. \w He|strong="H3117"\w* \w has|strong="H1961"\w* \w laid|strong="H3478"\w* siege \w against|strong="H4480"\w* \w us|strong="H3117"\w*. \w They|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* strike \w the|strong="H4480"\w* judge \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w with|strong="H3318"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* rod \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* cheek.

\w But|strong="H3651"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w*, Bethlehem Ephrathah, \w being|strong="H1121"\w* small amongst \w the|strong="H5921"\w* clans \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Judah, \w out|strong="H5414"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w one|strong="H1121"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w come|strong="H7725"\w* \w out|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w who|strong="H1121"\w* \w is|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* ruler \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; \w whose|strong="H1121"\w* goings \w out|strong="H5414"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w*, \w from|strong="H7725"\w* ancient \w times|strong="H6256"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H6258"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* abandon \w them|strong="H5975"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w time|strong="H6258"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* labour \w gives|strong="H5975"\w* birth. \w Then|strong="H6258"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* rest \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* brothers \w will|strong="H3068"\w* return \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* children \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Israel.

\w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H2088"\w* \w stand|strong="H6965"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w shall|strong="H2088"\w* \w shepherd|strong="H7462"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* strength \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* majesty \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* name \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* God. \w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* live, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w then|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* great \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* ends \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* earth.

\w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H2719"\w* \w be|strong="H2719"\w* \w our|strong="H5337"\w* peace \w when|strong="H3588"\w* Assyria invades \w our|strong="H5337"\w* \w land|strong="H1366"\w* \w and|strong="H2719"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* marches \w through|strong="H3588"\w* \w our|strong="H5337"\w* fortresses, \w then|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H2719"\w* raise \w against|strong="H2719"\w* \w him|strong="H3588"\w* seven \w shepherds|strong="H7462"\w*, \w and|strong="H2719"\w* eight leaders \w of|strong="H1366"\w* men.

\w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* rule \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w land|strong="H7130"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Assyria \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* sword, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w land|strong="H7130"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Nimrod \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w its|strong="H5921"\w* gates. \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* deliver \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Assyrian, \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* invades \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w land|strong="H7130"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* marches \w within|strong="H7130"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w border|strong="H1961"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5674"\w* \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* \w of|strong="H7611"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* amongst \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w peoples|strong="H5971"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* dew \w from|strong="H1471"\w* \w the|strong="H5674"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w like|strong="H1961"\w* showers \w on|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H5674"\w* grass, \w that|strong="H5971"\w* don’t wait \w for|strong="H5971"\w* \w man|strong="H5674"\w* \w nor|strong="H5674"\w* wait \w for|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H5674"\w* sons \w of|strong="H7611"\w* \w men|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* remnant \w of|strong="H3027"\w* Jacob \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* amongst \w the|strong="H3605"\w* nations, amongst many peoples, \w like|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* lion amongst \w the|strong="H3605"\w* animals \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* forest, \w like|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* young lion amongst \w the|strong="H3605"\w* flocks \w of|strong="H3027"\w* sheep; \w who|strong="H3605"\w*, if \w he|strong="H3605"\w* goes \w through|strong="H3027"\w*, treads \w down|strong="H3772"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* tears \w in|strong="H5921"\w* pieces, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w there|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3027"\w* \w no|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* deliver.

\w Let|strong="H1961"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* hand \w be|strong="H1961"\w* lifted \w up|strong="H1961"\w* above \w your|strong="H3068"\w* adversaries, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w let|strong="H1961"\w* \w all|strong="H3772"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* enemies \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w off|strong="H3772"\w*.

“\w It|strong="H3772"\w* \w will|strong="H5892"\w* happen \w in|strong="H5892"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* day”, says \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, “\w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H3772"\w* \w will|strong="H5892"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w off|strong="H3772"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* horses \w from|strong="H3772"\w* amongst \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w and|strong="H5892"\w* \w will|strong="H5892"\w* \w destroy|strong="H3772"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* chariots.

\w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w off|strong="H3772"\w* \w the|strong="H3772"\w* cities \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H3808"\w* land \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* tear \w down|strong="H3772"\w* \w all|strong="H3772"\w* \w your|strong="H3808"\w* strongholds.

\w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w destroy|strong="H3772"\w* witchcraft \w from|strong="H3772"\w* \w your|strong="H3808"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*. \w You|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3027"\w* \w have|strong="H3027"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* soothsayers.

\w I|strong="H5892"\w* \w will|strong="H5892"\w* cut off \w your|strong="H7130"\w* engraved images \w and|strong="H5892"\w* \w your|strong="H7130"\w* pillars \w from|strong="H5892"\w* amongst \w you|strong="H7130"\w*; \w and|strong="H5892"\w* \w you|strong="H7130"\w* \w shall|strong="H5892"\w* no more worship \w the|strong="H7130"\w* work \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w your|strong="H7130"\w* hands.

\w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H1471"\w* uproot \w your|strong="H8085"\w* Asherah poles \w from|strong="H8085"\w* amongst \w you|strong="H6213"\w*; \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H1471"\w* \w destroy|strong="H6213"\w* \w your|strong="H8085"\w* cities.
I will execute vengeance in anger and wrath on the nations that didn’t listen.”
